compaction_summary.task: Synthesize M&A memorandum for Pinnacle Investment Management $1.8B acquisition

on_resume: Check for broken state before continuing

blocking_issue.description: Agent SDK Read tool cannot load section files due to 25k token limit. Used Bash cat >> to append directly.
blocking_issue.resolution_method: Used Bash cat >> to append sections directly to final-memorandum.md without reading into memory

decisions_made.decision: Use Bash cat >> for section assembly due to FILE_SIZE_LIMIT
decisions_made.reason: Section files exceed 25K Read limit (100KB-127KB each). Direct append bypasses tokenization.

decisions_made.decision: Append all sections directly without intermediate files
decisions_made.reason: Per instructions: DO NOT create *-integrated.md or *-pending.md files. Execute assembly immediately.

decisions_made.decision: Create native cross-references in Cross-Reference Matrix
decisions_made.reason: 30 documented connections with full section citations per instructions (no placeholder system)

key_findings: MFN side letter creates $98M perpetual exposure with no escrow protection
October 2023 SEC exam found 5 deficiency categories requiring remediation
critical_recommendations: Negotiate $98M escrow for MFN exposure (CRITICAL)
Complete CCO remediation plan before closing
cross_domain_impacts: Links to Section IV.E (SEC Enforcement) for exam follow-up risk
Links to Section IV.L (Insurance) for E&O coverage

key_findings: Section 3(a)(1)(C) exclusion requires continuous monitoring
40% securities threshold creates operational constraints
critical_recommendations: Implement monthly 40 Act testing protocol
Retain 40 Act counsel for ongoing compliance
cross_domain_impacts: Links to Section IV.G (Valuation) for portfolio composition monitoring

key_findings: Investment Committee lacks formal charter ($44M-$143M exposure)
Fee disclosure gaps create prohibited transaction risk
critical_recommendations: Implement formal Investment Committee charter before closing
Complete fee disclosure audit for all ERISA clients
cross_domain_impacts: Links to Section IV.I (Employment) for fiduciary training requirements

key_findings: Marketing Rule compliance gaps in performance advertising

critical_recommendations: Complete Marketing Rule compliance audit before closing
Standardize side letter disclosure procedures

key_findings: October 2023 exam deficiencies create follow-up examination risk
